code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dropdown=_ref=>{let{options,onSelect}=_ref;const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const[selectedOption,setSelectedOption]=useState(options[0]||null);const dropdownRef=useRef(null);const handleSelectOption=option=>{setSelectedOption(option);onSelect(option.value);setIsOpen(false);};const handleClickOutside=event=>{if(dropdownRef.current&&!dropdownRef.current.contains(event.target)){setIsOpen(false);}};useEffect(()=>{document.addEventListener("click",handleClickOutside,true);return()=>{document.removeEventListener("click",handleClickOutside,true);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:dropdownRef,className:"relative h-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen),className:`inline-flex w-full justify-between border h-full items-center p-2 px-3 rounded-md shadow-sm  focus:outline-none `,children:[selectedOption?selectedOption.label:"Select an option",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{className:"-mr-1 ml-2 h-5 w-5",xmlns:"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg",viewBox:"0 0 20 20",fill:"currentColor","aria-hidden":"true",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("path",{fillRule:"evenodd",d:"M6.293 7.293a1 1 0 011.414 0L10 9.586l2.293-2.293a1 1 0 111.414 1.414l-3 3a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-3-3a1 1 0 010-1.414z",clipRule:"evenodd"})})]}),isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`bg-gray-300 text-black origin-top-right absolute right-0 mt-2 w-full rounded-md shadow-lg focus:outline-none z-10`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"",role:"menu","aria-orientation":"vertical","aria-labelledby":"options-menu",children:options.map(option=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleSelectOption(option),className:`block w-full text-left px-4 py-2 h-11 hover:bg-gray-200 focus:outline-none`,role:"menuitem",children:option.label},option.value))})})]});};export default Dropdown;
